name: Dungeon Warrior 4
description:
Dungeon Warrior 4 Dungeon Warrior 4 Dungeon Warrior 4 Dungeon Warrior 4

In this epic conclusion of the Dungeon Warrior Series a young man name David and his childhood friends Kyle and William has to help a young woman name Su get back home to her dimension. Meanwhile an evil empire ruled by the evil Donavon will do anything to capture Su and use her powers for evil. It's up to David to protect Su from the evil Donavon and find a way to get her back home safely.

Crafting System

You will be able to craft 110 different items, weapons, armor and relics. So instead of buying weapons and armor you have to buy materials and craft them. The more powerful weapon and armor your crafting the harder it will be to complete the crafted weapon and armor

Class Changing System

As you progress through the game, you'll earn Job Crystals which allows you to change character classes at any time in the game. One minute be a warrior and the next minute be a Cleric.

10 Hours of gameplay

With 2 large worlds to explore this game will provide you with many challenges and difficult monsters to fight. But with many places to explore the adventure will be long and exciting.
